chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 has a problem: The order has not been shipped yet. Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market. 

We wanted to let you know Alberto Carlos del Campo hasn’t received their order.

We’ve checked the tracking link, but there isn’t an update.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

Once we’ve got all the paperwork, we’ll let you know within one business day if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,

Regards,
Valentina, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number 1ZBF1560D901114540. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=es_es&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901114540/trackdetails

Regards,
JY

Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:

The touch doesn't work. The screen turns on but doesn't respond when touched.

Thank you,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
